actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Farmers Home Administration for rural water and waste disposal grants (rescission numbered R87-6) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds budget authority for Farmers Home Administration rural water and waste disposal grants (R87-6).

titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Farmers Home Administration for rural water and waste disposal grants (rescission numbered R87-6) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
